-- Megatron / Switchblade --

Megatron's flame red dragon form swoops downward, and snags 
Warhead's mangled body from the ground, as the Predacons retreat 
back to their base.

<<The Predacons appear to be out numbered at the moment,>> thinks 
Megatron as his battered form glides along easily in the clouds. 
<<The next move will have to be well planned. Switchblade had better 
have finished making at least half of those auto guns.>>

He opens a commlink to the Pred base, "Switchblade."

------------------------------------

Back at the Predacon base, Switchblade catches his name coming 
through the commlink, "...Swit..*bzzt*..ade..."

Switchblade gets up, and heads to the base commlink beside the 
entrace to the engine room. "Ya ya, what's happenin Megs?" 
Switchblade says easily over the comm.

Megatron growls back over the comm, "I have no time for your antics, 
are the defenses complete?" His irritating, bordering on anger was 
quite obvious even over the comm.

Switchblade smiles to himself, <<have I completed the defenses 
yet... bah>> "Yup, it's all done and ready to be set up. We have 
four auto guns, two laser turrets, and a missile launcher. That's 
all I was able to put together from the scraps I was given."

"Good..." Megatron says, pleased that at least something was a 100% 
success. "Prepare them to be set up when my forces return. Megatron 
out."

Switchblade nods to the comm, "Alright, I'll have em there in a 
jiffy." He begins to drag the bulky weapons to the storage bay.
